title: White Sandwich Loaf
ingredients: ['480g white bread flour', '300-320ml warm water', '2 dessertspoons olive oil or 20g softened butter', '1 1/2 teaspoons salt', '2 teaspoons caster sugar', '7g vital wheat gluten (optional)', '2 teaspoons lecithin granules (optional)', '20g dried skimmed milk powder', '1 1/2-2 teaspoons easy bake yeast']
